column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=IN :
#Text=That ’s a great question , because there are two things and they really are in tandem .
#Text=If I only could have one thing , it would be to end suffering .
#Text=If you could take things from animals and kill animals all day long without causing them suffering , then I would take it .
#Text=But I think there ’s another question that underlies that .
#Text=Everybody should be able to agree that animals should not suffer if you kill them or steal from them by taking the fur off their backs or take their eggs , whatever .
#Text=But you should n’t put them through torture to do that .
#Text=We should all agree on that since we really do n’t care at all for suffering .

#Text=But I think there ’s this other question : Who are we that we have set ourselves up on this pedestal and we believe that we have a right take from others everything — including their life — simply because we want to do it ?
#Text=Should n’t we stop and think for a second that maybe they are just others like us ?
#Text=Other nations , other individuals , other cultures .
#Text=Just others .
#Text=Not sub-human , but just different from being human .
#Text=Newkirk on the worst corporate animal abusers
#Text=DS : When you think of companies — obviously Butterball would be one —
#Text=IN :
#Text=Smithfield Foods
#Text=, yes .
#Text=DS : Who are some of the most egregious abusers of animals ?
#Text=IN :
#Text=It ’s a long list , but I would say at the moment it is people like Versace and Jean-Paul Gaultier if you are talking about fur .

#Text=If you are talking about wool clothing , there is Australian Wool Innovation that sticks up for all the wool farmers that export all over the world the majority of wool , and they are scurrilous .
#Text=They will not stop live export where thousand upon thousands of these sheep die in appalling conditions on the way to the Middle East .
#Text=They will not stop mulesing , which is cutting the flesh off the backsides of lambs when they are just a few days old without any anesthesia .
#Text=We are fighting them .
#Text=They need to change and come into the 21st Century .
#Text=KFC ; we have been after them for several years now .
#Text=All we are asking is that they switch to Controlled Atmosphere Killing .
#Text=We know they wo n’t switch to soy chicken overnight , although I have given them all kinds of soy chicken and said , “ You know , broaden your market base — live a little ! ”
#Text=I ’m sure they throw it in the trash , which is a shame .
#Text=DS :
#Text=“ Oh God , here comes Ingrid Newkirk with her soy chickens again ! ”
#Text=IN :
#Text=[ Laughs ] There ’s great stuff !
#Text=There are even soy Buffalo wings on the market that are delicious .
#Text=DS : What is Controlled Atmosphere Killing ?
